alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oklahoma County through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tinker Air Force Base. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Spencer, Nicoma Park, Tinker Air Force Base and Smith Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 155 and 166. Interstate 240 between mile markers 8 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
